name: Dodge: The Game
overview: A 1992 puzzle game in the style of Simon created by Wim Broer and Marc V. D. Bovenkamp and released in 1992 by Excellent Software Development. Wait until the computer has chosen the order. After that you can imitate the computers example to match it exactly. If you do it right you go to the next challenge and will see a prompt to watch the next sequence.
